definition: To divide or split something into separate parts, often used in the context of breaking or cleaving an object or material into two or more pieces. It can also refer to the act of causing a division or rift between people or groups.

examples.german: Er möchte den Kuchen in zwei Hälften spalten.
examples.english: He wants to divide the cake in half.

examples.german: Die Straße ist durch einen Flusslauf gespalten.
examples.english: The road is split by a riverbed.

examples.german: Die Partei spaltet sich in verschiedene Fraktionen.
examples.english: The party is splitting into different factions.
